keyMoments.title: Groggy Monsters Compete in Round 2
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates' Groggy Monsters team (Hamburg, Pickles, and Big Pan) compete against Zoro and Sanji in the Groggy Ring match.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Foxy Pirates' combat strength and their willingness to cheat to win the Davy Back Fight.

jollyRoger.description: A fox skull with crossed bones
